attributes.action: Strip Sir Richard Branson of his knighthood for attempting to subvert democracy.
attributes.background: Sir Richard Branson is reportedly helping to fund a group that wishes to reverse the June referendum in which the UK voted by a clear margin to leave the European Union. This is an affront to the democratic process by a billionaire oligarch who does not live in Britain.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
